content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=20.5, y=-4.0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (x=22.5, y=-7.5)
- Boiler at Position (x=20.5, y=-4.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (x=19.5, y=-1.5)
- Connected Pipe Group from Position (x=20.5, y=-10.5) to (x=20.5, y=-5.5)
- Small Electric Poles at various positions providing electrical connections

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0) with iron ore input
- Stone Furnace at Position (x=2.0, y=0.0) with iron ore input

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (x=5.0, y=5.0) with copper ore input
- Inserter at Position (x=7.5, y=5.5) waiting for source items
- Wooden Chest at Position (x=8.5, y=5.5) for storage
- Transport Belt connecting the furnace to the chest

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at Position (x=10.5, y=0.5) with copper cable recipe
- Inserter at Position (x=9.5, y=5.5) waiting for source items
- Belt Group connecting inputs and outputs

### Iron Ore Mining Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (x=-11.0, y=20.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at Position (x=-11.5, y=18.5) storing extracted iron ore

### Water Supply System
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (x=4.5, y=-10.5)
- Connected Pipe Group from Position (x=4.5, y=-9.5) to (x=8.5, y=-7.5)

### Electricity Network
Consists of:
- Electricity Group with Small Electric Poles at various positions providing power distribution

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity. For example, attempting to insert coal into a furnace without having coal in your inventory will result in an error.

### Errors due to missing resources in production
- Ensure that all required resources are available for production processes. For example, the assembling machine at Position (x=10.5, y=0.5) cannot create copper cables due to missing copper plates.

### Errors when using inserters waiting for source items
- Make sure the source items are available for inserters to pick up. Inserters waiting for source items will not function until the necessary items are present.
